title: An Act to stop profiling transgender people and low-income women

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Cyr, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1062) of Julian Cyr for legislation to stop profiling transgender people and low-income women.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
